release.action: Changes to media field to best handle thumbnails by using a virtual uri /thumbnail/[media UUID]
Added a new mehod addToParameters in ConfigurableFreemarkerDialog that can be overridden to supply custom values to the freemarker template
Update handling of multi-value properties in ConfigurableFreemarkerDialog to magnolia 4.0
Fixed bug for column size on ie6 (see http://extjs.com/forum/showthread.php?p=151624 )
Added functionality to move rows in grid
Misc fixes to "clear all" and "paste" features
grid control now works properly also with fields containing non-standard chars in their name
esternal javascript are now included only once when using multiple grid controls in the same dialog
New "combo" control type handled by grid
Extjs has been moved to openutils-mgnlext, which is now a required dependency
fixed a javascript error on ext which sometimes popped up on dalog loading
Initial public release. Version numbering starts from 3.5 to match the compatible magnolia version.
